title: Decisiveness
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>*Sigh*.... What should I do....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>If you sigh, happiness will escape you, you know, Dia-san♪ What’s up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>You see, I made a new training plan, but after reviewing it, I find it to be a little bit harsh after all.... I was wondering if I should remake it or give it a try.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah, was it the one that Nozomi-chan was talking about?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, that’s it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>You made it because you want Aqours to level up, right? Then why don’t you give it a shot! I’m sure Aqours can do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Is that so.... No, that must be. I must believe in it first. Thank you very much. I really respect your decisiveness, Honoka-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe~~, I’m not that great~.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Then, take this. It’s the μ’s version of the Aqours training plan Nozomi-san asked me to make. It’s quite demanding, but I believe that Honoka-san and everyone else can do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
